titleStmt.title: Letters from the lords of Her Maiesties most honourable Priuie Counsell for the furnishing and supplying of horses in all townes where the postes are established, for the reliefe of the postes there, and furtherance of Her Maiesties seruice directed to all maiors, shiriffes, iustices of the peace, bailifes, conestables, hedborowes and all other Her Maiesties officers ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Privy Council.

titleStmt.title: Letters from the lords of Her Maiesties most honourable Priuie Counsell for the furnishing and supplying of horses in all townes where the postes are established, for the reliefe of the postes there, and furtherance of Her Maiesties seruice directed to all maiors, shiriffes, iustices of the peace, bailifes, conestables, hedborowes and all other Her Maiesties officers ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: By the deputies of Christopher Barker, Printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Copy of two letters, dated 11 April, and 20 April, 1596.
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
